title: "greek alphabet" exhibition
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108073724im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_4966.png)

I would like to inform you that the deadline for submissions for the "Ελληνικό Αλφάβητο" exhibition ends at the 15th of May.

Additionally, the best submissions will be awarded with 1000, 700 and 500 euros worth of prizes, including type related software, books and typefaces.

--------------------------------

You can find more information at:  
 [http://www.ictvc.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108073724/http:/www.ictvc.org/ "http://www.ictvc.org")  
 [http://ea.backpacker.gr](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108073724/http:/ea.backpacker.gr/ "http://ea.backpacker.gr")

Submissions at:  
 [http://ea.backpacker.gr](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108073724/http:/ea.backpacker.gr/ "http://ea.backpacker.gr")

Questions, comments at:  
 [contact@backpacker.gr](mailto:contact@backpacker.gr)
author: gtrianta
